comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Gertrude Foster Brown (1867- 1956) suffragist; elected president of the New York State Woman Suffrage Association in October, 1913. Author of "Your Vote and How to Use It" (1918). Her papers are in the Schlesinger Library: oasis.lib.harvard.edu/oasis/deliver/~sch00164
